name: @activescott/web-app-stack
description: This project is intended to be a template for using [Architect](https://arc.codes/) on the server and React on the client for a web application. It uses TypeScript on both the server and the client.

scripts.test-server: pushd .; cd server; npm run -s test; popd
scripts.test-client: pushd .; cd client; npm run -s test; popd
scripts.test-all: npm run -s test-server && npm run -s test-client
scripts.deploy-staging: pushd .; cd server; npm run -s deploy-staging; popd
scripts.deploy-production: pushd .; cd server; npm run -s deploy-production; popd
scripts.install-server: pushd .; cd server; npm install; popd
scripts.install-client: pushd .; cd client; npm install; popd
scripts.install-all: npm run install-server; npm run install-client;
scripts.start: pushd .; cd server; npm run start; popd

author: scott@willeke.com
